VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.label: Nightsister Magick
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.description: Harness the power of the Force to cast unique abilities.
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.tooltip: Nightsister magick encompasses a potent blend of dark side sorcery, rituals, and mystical arts native to the Force-sensitive witches of Dathomir, wielded to manipulate, curse, and command the forces of nature and beyond.

GeneDef.label: Magick Supply
GeneDef.description: This Gene allows the use of nightsister magick using a resource called Ichor. Abilities are found in the psycaster path Nightsister Magick
GeneDef.resourceDescription: A reserve of a luminescent green mist that originated in the depths of Dathomir.
